Good morning Hagop, 

 

Happy Friday!

We would like to consult with you, for insurance claim, is it necessary to share the full lease agreement of the related location?

We have a pending claim for Ralph Lauren Dubai Mall pertaining to the heavy rain last year and now the insurance company is asking to share the store lease agreement.

 

 

Best regards,

 

Roselle Reyes 
Administration Coordinator I

 <https://url.uk.m.mimecastprotect.com/s/qvk8CgQl4Smwm4qtNf4c4wXoF?domain=etoilegroup.com>

--------------------------------------------------
ID: CT9UAEJ_01
From: Hagop Ghazarian <Hagop.Ghazarian@chalhoub.com>

Hi Roselle,

Just send the page that has the insurance section and the covenants of the tenant. That has the necessary details.

If it is a large claim and the surveyor is requesting the full copy, you can redact any sensitive information and send the redacted version.

Let me know if you need any further assistance.

Best Regards,
Hagop
